page.title: 02Population Of Inverarity
page.content: The population of Inverarity is about one hundred and eighty.Most of the population is made up of males. The people mainly live in four or five person families The families, apart from those in the village, are widely spread apart. The majority of the populatoin is made up of children below the age of twelve.The other large group is in the twenty to fifty age range.From our survey we also found that Inverarity had very few elderly people in the community.We also found that there were about three boys for every one girl. Most of the working population work on the land with a few travelling into nearby towns,such as,Forfar or Dundee.
